---
title: "Solar Sailor"
date: "2012-01-10"
author: "Ocius Administrator"
---

### ![](http://solarsailor.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/images5.jpg "images5")

#### Specifications:

Passengers: 100  
Length: 21 m

Beam: 10 m  
Draft: 1.3 m  
Energy: Hybrid Marine Power 40 x 2(Series operation)  
Speed: 0 – 10 knots  
Facilities: Central kiosk, A/C, unisex bathrooms.Low cost, low pollution, and low noise.  
This ferry benefits local governments, local businesses and residents. This vessel has 8 SolarSails.

**General:**  
Winner of Australian Design Award of the Year 2001\. This vessel is owned by SolarSailor as a test vessel and operated successfully commercially for ten years on Sydney Harbour under Captain Cook Cruises. Now operating in Newcastle Australia – avaialable for charters and leasing.

[![](http://solarsailor.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Sydney-Solar-Sailor-plans2-227x300.jpg "Sydney Solar Sailor plans")](http://solarsailor.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/Sydney-Solar-Sailor-plans2.jpg) ![](data:image/png;base64,)
